text: Lawrence "Larry" Schneider, (born March 23, 1938) is a Canadian politician. Born in Regina, Saskatchewan, he was mayor of Regina from 1979 until 1988. In the 1988 federal election, he was elected as a Progressive Conservative candidate in the riding of Regina—Wascana. Under Kim Campbell's government, from June 25, 1993 until November 3, 1993, he was Minister of Western Economic Diversification. He lost his seat in the 1993 election to Ralph Goodale. He was president of the Prairie Implement Manufacturers' Association. Schneider supported Conservative Party candidate Michael Kram in the riding of Regina- Wascana in the 2015 federal election. ==Electoral record== === Regina—Wascana === == References == ;Notes ;Sources * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Regina, Saskatchewan Category:Members of the 25th Canadian Ministry Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Saskatchewan Category:Progressive Conservative Party of Canada MPs Category:Members of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada
title: Larry Schneider (politician)
